Name: pilot_laterano
Description: Laterano is a country located on an island close to Iberia, RIM Billiton, Siracusa, and Victoria. It is a theocratic country where all of the Sankta came from with a constitution that guarantees 13 rights to its citizens, and an unspecified religion playing a major role in their society. If a citizen of Laterano becomes Infected, while they are still allowed to keep their citizenship along with all its rights, they will not be allowed to set foot on Laterano territory outside of special circumstances.
